articles.title: Apple Offloads Old AirPods Pro Stock at Record Lows, Now Going for Mere Pennies - Gizmodo
articles.description: Apple is clearing out AirPods Pro 2 inventory as the AirPods Pro 3 are now official, and offers the previous generation at its lowest price ever on Amazon.
articles.content: The AirPods Pro 3 just launched with a handful of AI-powered features but here’s the thing: the sound quality, design, and core functionality remain identical to the previous generation. So instead o… [+3063 chars]
